janadhipathithumage nisi manga penwimath hamudawe kapa wimath samanga apata ape rata bera ganna labuna.eyinuth wishesha karya bharayak ishta kale yuda hamudawayi.kiriwehera raja maha wiharaye nawa wiharadhipathi kobawaka dhamminda himiyan ese prakasha kale ikuth irida (6) kiriwehere pawathi yuda hamudawe hata hathara wani sanwathsaraya samarimath rata daya samayata janadhipathi warayata, thriwidha hamudawe saha polisiye miya giya ranawiruwanta menma rata wasiyanta pin anumodan kirimatath yuda hamudawe rejimenthu dhaja aasiri ganwima sandahath pawathwana lada aagamika wada satahanediya.
me kridawa athule kopamana salli thibenawada kiyala balala thamayi godak denek enne.....‚Äù ‚Äúwigananaya paththen ma dakina de thamayi me kiyanne.

thewarak adhikaranayata nopamini adala sakkikaruwanta wiweka dinayak udawana wita 2020 pasuwewi yayi withthiye nithignyayaku adhikaranayedi pawasa thibune upahasathmakawa wiya hakiya. 19 wani sanshodhanaya nisa janadhipathiwarayaku adhikaranayata kandawimata thibu nithimaya badhawa iwath wiya. 1978 sammatha karagath je.aar. jayawardhana mahathage wyawasthawata anuwa nam janadhipathiwaraya kisidu hethuwak nisa adhikaranayata kandawiya nohakiya.

swamiwu dewiyanwahanse manushyaya ragena eedan uyana wawantath balagantath ehi padinchikerewuseka. 16 swamiwu dewiyanwahanse manushyayata aagnya karamin: numbaata uyane siyalu gaswalin kamathi lesa kanta puluwana; 17 eheth yahapatha ha napura danaganime gahen kanta epaya; maknisada eyin ka dawasehi eekanthayen numbaa nasinnehiyayi kiseka. 18 swamiwu dewiyanwahanse kathakota: manushyaya thaniyama sitima honda natha; ohuta sudusu sahakariyak sada dennemiyi kiseka. 19 swamiwu dewiyanwahanse wanaye siyalu mrugayanda aakashaye siyalu pakshinda bhumiyen sada manushyaya unta mona mona nam thabannedayi balana pinisa un ohu wethata paminewuseka.
